metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10941 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Arm Mbed TLS before 2.16.5 allows attackers to obtain sensitive information (an RSA private key) by measuring cache usage during an import.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-10941` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto3 - 2.16.5-1ubuntu1
libmbedtls12 - 2.16.5-1ubuntu1
libmbedx509-0 - 2.16.5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.5-1ubuntu1').
